  1. The amount of insolation received varies from latitude to latitude.
  2. Regions within the equator and 40째 N and S latitudes are energy deficit regions
  3. Regions beyond 40째 N and S latitudes are energy surplus regions
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
The amount of insolation received varies from latitude to latitude. The Regions within the equator and 40째 N and S latitudes are energy surplus regions because they receive abundant sunlight and hence more heat will be gained than lost.
The Regions beyond 40째 N and S latitudes are energy deficit regions because they lose more heat than that gained from sunlight.
